description: Used to request a two fa reset token to be sent by email, can be requested with a twoFaToken returned by an authentication attempt.

userId.description: The id of the user that attempted to authenticate.

twoFaResetEndpoint.description: The portal endpoint used as reset link prefix, must be a domain owned by sage.

twoFaToken.description: The token that was included in the error response when authenticating.

password.description: The current user password that can be used in place of the twoFaToken (e.g. when authenticating with user/password or during a change password workflow).
